SELECT A.PAYMENT_SN AS PAYMENT_SN, A.USER_ID AS USER_ID, A.TATTOO_ID AS TATTOO_ID, A.TATTOO_NM AS TATTOO_NM, A.RESERVED_DT AS RESERVED_DT, A.PRICE AS PRICE, A.COLOR AS COLOR, B.COLOR AS COLOR_NAME, A.TATTOOIST_NAME AS TATTOOIST_NAME, A.PAYMENT_CMPL_YN AS PAYMENT_CMPL_YN, A.REG_DTM AS REG_DTM, A.UPD_DTM AS UPD_DTM FROM PAYMENT A LEFT JOIN TATTOOCOLOR B ON (A.COLOR = B.SEQ) WHERE A.USER_ID = #userId#
AND A.TATTOO_NM LIKE CONCAT(#searchValue#, '%')
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM ASC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#
SELECT PAYMENT_SN, USER_ID, TATTOO_ID, TATTOO_NM, PRICE, COLOR, TATTOOIST_NAME, RESERVED_DT, PAYMENT_CMPL_YN, REG_DTM, UPD_DTM FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_SN = #PAYMENT_SN#
